template.template: Template SNMP Keepalived Check Virtual Servers
template.name: Template SNMP Keepalived Check Virtual Servers

application.name: Keepalived Check Virtual Server Group Members

item_prototype.name: virtualServerAddress $1
item_prototype.description: If the virtual server is defined from an IP address, this is the value of the IP. Otherwise, this column should not exist in the current row.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerAddrType $1
item_prototype.description:
If the virtual server is defined from an IP, this is the address family. Otherwise, this column should not exist in the current row.
unknown (0) ipv4 (1) ipv6 (2) ipv4z (3) ipv6z (4) dns (16)

item_prototype.name: virtualServerAlpha $1
item_prototype.description:
Is alpha mode enabled?
enabled (1) disabled (2)

item_prototype.name: virtualServerDelayLoop $1
item_prototype.description: Delay in seconds between two checks.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerFwMark $1
item_prototype.description: If the virtual server is defined from a firewall mark, this is the value of the mark. Otherwise, this column should not exist in the current row.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerHaSuspend $1
item_prototype.description:
If set to true(1), checks will be suspended if the IP of the virtual server is currently not set.
true (1) false (2)

item_prototype.name: virtualServerHysteresis $1
item_prototype.description: Hysteresis with respect to quorum count.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerLoadBalancingAlgo $1
item_prototype.description:
Which load balancing algorithm (or scheduler) should be used for this virtual server.
rr (1) wrr (2) lc (3) wlc (4) lblc (5) lblcr (6) dh (7) sh (8) sed (9) nq (10) unknown (99)

item_prototype.name: virtualServerLoadBalancingKind $1
item_prototype.description:
Forwarding method to use for this virtual server.
nat (1) dr (2) tun (3)

item_prototype.name: virtualServerOmega $1
item_prototype.description:
Is omega mode enabled?
enabled (1) disabled (2)

item_prototype.name: virtualServerOPS $1
item_prototype.description: If set to true(1), One-Packet-Scheduling will be applied.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerPersist $1
item_prototype.description:
Is the virtual service persistence enabled?
enabled (1) disabled (2)

item_prototype.name: virtualServerPersistGranularity $1
item_prototype.description: Netmask specifying the granularity of the persistence mechanism.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerPersistTimeout $1
item_prototype.description: If this virtual service is persistence, what is the timeout (seconds).

item_prototype.name: virtualServerPort $1
item_prototype.description: If the virtual server is defined from an IP, this is the value of the port to listen for requests. Otherwise, this column should not exist in the current row.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerProtocol $1
item_prototype.description:
Which transport protocol should be used for this virtual server.
tcp (1) udp (2)

item_prototype.name: virtualServerQuorum $1
item_prototype.description: Quorum to get among real servers to consider this virtual server up.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerQuorumDown $1
item_prototype.description: Command to execute when the quorum is not met.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerQuorumStatus $1
item_prototype.description: Quorum to get amond real servers to consider this virtual server up.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerQuorumUp $1
item_prototype.description: Command to execute when the quorum is met.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerRateCps $1
item_prototype.description: Current connection rate for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerRateInBPS $1
item_prototype.description: Current incoming rate (Bytes/sec) for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerRateInPPS $1
item_prototype.description: Current incoming rate (Packets/sec) for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerRateOutBPS $1
item_prototype.description: Current outgoing rate (Bytes/sec) for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerRateOutPPS $1
item_prototype.description: Current outgoing rate (Packets/sec) for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerRealServersTotal $1
item_prototype.description: Total number of real servers for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerRealServersUp $1
item_prototype.description: Number of real servers actually up for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerStatsConns $1
item_prototype.description: Total number of connections scheduled for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerStatsInBytes $1
item_prototype.description: Total number of incoming bytes for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerStatsInPkts $1
item_prototype.description: Total number of incoming packets for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerStatsOutBytes $1
item_prototype.description: Total number of outgoing bytes for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerStatsOutPkts $1
item_prototype.description: Total number of outgoing packets for this virtual server.

item_prototype.name: virtualServerStatus $1
item_prototype.description:
Current status of this virtual server.
alive (1) dead (2)

item_prototype.name: virtualServerType $1
item_prototype.description:
Type of virtual server. A virtual server can either be defined from a firewall mark, an IP and a port or from a virtual server group.
fwmark (1) ip (2) group (3)

item_prototype.name: virtualServerVirtualHost $1
item_prototype.description: Virtualhost of this server for HTTP like requests.

item.host: Template SNMP Keepalived Check Virtual Servers
Template SNMP Keepalived Check Virtual Servers
Template SNMP Keepalived Check Virtual Servers
Template SNMP Keepalived Check Virtual Servers
Template SNMP Keepalived Check Virtual Servers
